pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 22, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 22, 2018:

Note: All times local.

Sussex, New Brunswick

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of New Brunswick, Brian Gallant.

Suite 201
Amsterdam Inn & Suites
143 Main Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion on rural economic growth.

Conference Room
Amsterdam Inn & Suites
143 Main Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit The Work Room Career Resource Centre and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2018’s Canada Workers Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Room 1118
Sussex Regional High School
55 Leonard Drive

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of the visit
  • Open coverage of the media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m. and to report to the conference room via the main office.

Media appearances

8:45 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada Première NB, Le réveil.

9 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on K94.5 Moncton, K-Rise with Aaron and Tosh.
